オプション1:
Carefully avoiding the cube-shaped monsters,
Star Man had spent about three hours walking, resting, and walking again.
By then, he was too exhausted to keep going.

As Star Man sat down, too tired to move, he noticed something moving near a distant rock.
Looking more closely, it seemed to be two children.

"Hey!"
Star Man waved and headed toward the children.
The children remained seated, whispering to each other.
